name: Joined At The Ship (sphrz, EagleUke, Isaiah-Liljestrand, Jacob Marks)
name_original: Joined At The Ship (sphrz, EagleUke, Isaiah-Liljestrand, Jacob Marks)
description:
Full-screen recommended

Maneuver around a Steam-Punk themed environment through grappling and grabbing your environment.

Left Click: Grapple to rings or objects. Grappled objects attach to the ship and remain attached.

Right Click: Use a mechanical rod to secure yourself against rings or move around objects and yourself. Move mouse while rod is attached to an object to apply force.

Challenges:

1. Complete the level

2. Complete the level while only attaching balloons

3. Complete the level while only attaching fans

4. Complete the level while only attaching crates

5. Complete the level only using grapple points

6. Complete the level without using grapple points

7. Reach the objective with at least 10 objects still attached to the ship

8. Destroy all objects in the level.

9. Beat the game in under 1 minute

10. Beat the game in under 45 seconds

11. Beat the game in under 35 seconds
